title: I'll fix the elo system for the silver and bronze population.
body:
Remove silver and bronze because they are jokes.

Make a "Climb the Mountain" type of system, to where players will remain unranked until they get into a series to be accepted into low gold.

Honestly Riot even the word bronze or silver is laughable when players exchange ranks or post them, you need to do something about it.

Players should remain unranked until they are ready for a REAL title, not a dirty medal that's going to be hanged at the back of your basement.
There should be an elo system like the one BEFORE you made the tiers, until players are ready for the big leagues.
